Title: Trip to Stabby Town
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Jeffrey Lieber, Jenn Kao (executive story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Plot: Lucifer seeks Azrael's blade when he discovers it's been used in a string of violent stabbings linked to a local yoga studio.
